author: nixo.eth
content: theory about what? this server is active ethereum research & development. if something doesn't fit in an existing channel, it might be better in a different server

author: eagleeye0677
content: While Ethereum focuses on the State (Verkle), the ecosystem is increasingly looking for ways to manage Data (Prolly/CMTs).

author: eagleeye0677
content: Cartesian Merkle Trees (CMTs) and Prolly Trees

author: eagleeye0677
content: If a developer needs to prove that "User A has a balance between 10 and 50 tokens," Cartesian Merkle Trees (CMTs) are incredibly efficient at "range queries." Verkle trees are optimized for single-point lookups but can be bulkier for complex, ordered logic.
